56  |  WorkforceABF Field Recruiting Events
In June 2021, the ABF Field Recruiting team began hosting 
two-day hiring events at service centers across the nation. At 
these events, candidates completed applications, participated in 
interviews, and in many cases, received a same-day job offer — 
a fast-track version of the traditional hiring process.
The first event took place at the ABF service center in Carlisle, 
Pennsylvania, with 100 potential candidates, 70 interviews and 
39 accepted job offers. Since then, the ABF Field recruiting team 
has hosted more than 1,400 attendees, conducted over 1,100 
interviews and received 701 accepted job offers across the ABF 
network. 
As part of the ABF Employee Referral Program, we paid out 
more than $633,500 to employees, and in some locations, we 
have increased the referral bonus to $2,500 with employees 
receiving the full amount after taxes.
